downloadDescription: This Workplace Analytics playbook is a guide to help you employ a deliberate, data-driven approach to a variety of workspace planning scenarios.
detailsSection: This Workplace Analytics playbook is a guide to help you employ a deliberate, data-driven approach to a variety of workspace planning scenarios using a five-step process: Define, Explore, Diagnose, Change, and Measure. Workplace Analytics enables your organization to quantify the working relationships and habits of teams to optimize workspace allocation and improve employee connections and collaboration.
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.

    3.
